column4: I have googled this, and I know this may start some flame wars, but I am going to ask anyway.  Is there a "Gubuntu" distro in the works? As a spinoff distro? I kind of like Gnome3, some don't, but I do. It would be nice to have an "official" Gubuntu....
my guess is it's Ubuntu, but with GNOME 3 with gnome shell by default, instead of Unity :p
derivative distros are usually a waste of time, IMO
